chapters.title: Chapter 17: A Bronze Bear
chapters.info: Lady Danine Candraed, p. 336—High Seat of House Candraed. Dyelin went to her first to ask after support for Elayne for the Lion Throne. Dyelin was convinced that she would never make up her mind after the first hour, which she suspected would be the case from the start anyway, but she stayed three hours to avoid offending Danine.
